package.name: krb5
package.patch:
cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}/src
sed -i -e 's@\^u}@^u cols 300}@' tests/dejagnu/config/default.exp sed -i -e '/eq 0/{N;s/12 //}' plugins/kdb/db2/libdb2/test/run.test
package.install:
cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}/src
make install DESTDIR=${TGTDIR}
for f in gssapi_krb5 gssrpc k5crypto kadm5clnt kadm5srv \ kdb5 kdb_ldap krad krb5 krb5support verto ; do find ${TGTDIR}/usr/lib -type f -name "lib$f*.so*" -exec chmod -v 755 {} \; done
ln -v -sf libkrb5.so.3.3 ${TGTDIR}/usr/lib/libkrb5.so ln -v -sf libk5crypto.so.3.1 ${TGTDIR}/usr/lib/libk5crypto.so ln -v -sf libkrb5support.so.0.1 ${TGTDIR}/usr/lib/libkrb5support.so
